abilities.name: Mana Break
abilities.description:
Burns an opponent's mana on each attack.  Mana Break deals 60% of the mana burned as damage to the target.

Mana Break is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.

abilities.name: Blink
abilities.description: Short distance teleportation that allows Anti-Mage to move in and out of combat.

abilities.name: Spell Shield
abilities.description:
Increases Anti-Mage's resistance to magic damage.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Mana Void
abilities.description: For each point of mana missing by the target unit, damage is dealt to it and surrounding enemies.  The main target is also mini-stunned.

abilities.name: Berserker's Call
abilities.description: Axe taunts nearby enemy units, forcing them to attack him, while he gains bonus armor during the duration.

abilities.name: Battle Hunger
abilities.description:
Enrages an enemy unit, causing it to be slowed and take damage over time until it kills another unit or the duration ends. Axe gains movement speed for each unit affected with Battle Hunger.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Counter Helix
abilities.description: When attacked, Axe performs a helix counter attack, dealing pure damage to all nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Culling Blade
abilities.description: Axe spots a weakness and strikes, instantly killing an enemy unit with low health, or dealing moderate damage otherwise. When an enemy hero is killed with Culling Blade, its cooldown is reset, and Axe and nearby allied units gain bonus movement speed.

abilities.name: Enfeeble
abilities.description: Weakens an enemy unit, reducing its physical damage.  Lasts 20 seconds.

abilities.name: Brain Sap
abilities.description:
Feasts on the vital energies of an enemy unit, healing Bane and dealing damage.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Nightmare
abilities.description: Puts the target enemy or friendly Hero to sleep and deals damage per second.  Sleeping units are awakened when attacked, but the Nightmare passes to the attacking unit.  The nightmared unit instantly wakes up if it takes damage.

abilities.name: Fiend's Grip
abilities.description: CHANNELED - Grips an enemy unit, disabling it and causing heavy damage over time, while stealing mana every 0.5 seconds based on the unit's maximum mana.

abilities.name: Nightmare End
abilities.description: Ends all ongoing Nightmares.

abilities.name: Bloodrage
abilities.description: Drives a unit into a bloodthirsty rage during which a unit deals, and takes, increased damage. Units affected by Bloodrage will be healed for a percentage of the max health of any units they kill. Units affected by Bloodrage when killed will heal a percentage of their max health to their killer.

abilities.name: Blood Rite
abilities.description: Bloodseeker baptizes an area in sacred blood. After 3 seconds the ritual completes, causing any enemies caught in the area to take damage and become silenced.

abilities.name: Thirst
abilities.description: Bloodseeker is invigorated by the wounds of his enemies, gaining bonus movement speed and attack damage whenever an enemy hero's health falls below 75%, with the bonuses increasing as their health falls further. If an enemy hero's health falls below 25%, he will also gain vision and True Sight of that hero. Bonuses stack per hero.

abilities.name: Rupture
abilities.description:
Causes an enemy unit's skin to rupture. If the unit moves, it takes a percentage of the distance traveled as damage.  The damage is dealt through spell immunity.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Crystal Nova
abilities.description: A burst of damaging frost slows enemy movement and attack rate in the targeted area.

abilities.name: Frostbite
abilities.description: Encases an enemy unit in ice, prohibiting movement and attack, while dealing 50 damage every half-second. Lasts 10 seconds on creeps level 6 or lower.

abilities.name: Arcane Aura
abilities.description: Gives additional mana regeneration to all friendly units on the map. This bonus is increased for Crystal Maiden.

abilities.name: Freezing Field
abilities.description:
CHANNELED - Surrounds Crystal Maiden with random icy explosions that slow enemies and deal massive damage.  Lasts 10 seconds.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Frost Arrows
abilities.description: Adds a freezing effect to Drow's attacks, slowing enemy movement.  Lasts 1.5 seconds on Heroes, and 7 seconds on creeps.

abilities.name: Gust
abilities.description: Releases a wave that silences and knocks back enemy units. Knockback distance is relative to how close they are to you.

abilities.name: Precision Aura
abilities.description: Adds bonus damage to the physical attack of allied, ranged Hero units based on a percentage of Drow's agility.  Affects creeps for 30 seconds when cast.

abilities.name: Marksmanship
abilities.description:
Drow's experiences in battle improve her accuracy and effectiveness in combat, providing a passive bonus to Agility. Grants no bonus if there are enemy heroes within 400 range.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Fissure
abilities.description: Slams the ground with a mighty totem, creating an impassable ridge of stone while stunning and damaging enemy units along its line.

abilities.name: Enchant Totem
abilities.description:
Empowers Earthshaker's totem, causing it to deal extra damage on the next attack.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Aftershock
abilities.description: Causes the earth to shake underfoot, adding additional damage and stuns to nearby enemy units when Earthshaker casts his abilities.

abilities.name: Echo Slam
abilities.description: Shockwaves travel through the ground, damaging enemy units.  Each enemy hit causes an echo to damage nearby units.

abilities.name: Blade Fury
abilities.description:
Causes a bladestorm of destructive force around Juggernaut, rendering him immune to magic and dealing damage to nearby enemy units.  Lasts 5 seconds.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

abilities.name: Healing Ward
abilities.description: Summons a Healing Ward which heals all nearby allied units, based on their max health.  The Healing Ward moves at 420 movement speed after being summoned.  Lasts 25 seconds.

abilities.name: Blade Dance
abilities.description: Gives Juggernaut a chance to deal double damage on each attack.

abilities.name: Omnislash
abilities.description:
Juggernaut leaps towards the target enemy unit with a damaging attack, and then slashes other nearby enemy units, dealing between 200-225 damage per slash.  Juggernaut is invulnerable for the duration.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Starstorm
abilities.description:
Calls down a wave of meteors to damage nearby enemy units. The closest enemy unit to Mirana in a 425 radius will be struck a second time for 75% of the damage.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Sacred Arrow
abilities.description: Fires a long-range arrow with deadly precision, which stuns and damages the first enemy unit it strikes. The stun duration ranges from 0.01 to 5 seconds, with bonus damage up to 140 added, based on the distance the arrow travels to its target. Instantly kills the first non-ancient creep it hits.

abilities.name: Leap
abilities.description: Mirana leaps forward into battle, empowering allied units with a ferocious roar that grants bonus attack and movement speed. Speed bonus lasts 5 seconds.

abilities.name: Moonlight Shadow
abilities.description: Turns Mirana and all allied heroes invisible. If a hero is revealed, invisibility will restore after the fade delay as long as Moonlight Shadow's duration has not expired.

abilities.name: Spirit Lance
abilities.description:
Sends a magical spirit lance to a target enemy unit that damages and slows, while summoning an illusory phantom to attack the unit.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Doppelganger
abilities.description:
Phantom Lancer briefly vanishes from the battlefield. After 1 second, Phantom Lancer and any of his nearby illusions reappear at a random position within the targeted location, along with two additional doppelgangers. The two added doppelgangers have different properties: one takes normal damage and deals none, while the other takes 600% damage and deals 20% damage.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

abilities.name: Phantom Rush
abilities.description: When targetting an enemy for an attack, Phantom Lancer quickly charges into range, gaining a temporary agility boost upon reaching the target. Phantom Lancer's illusions also have this ability.

abilities.name: Juxtapose
abilities.description: Phantom Lancer has a chance to fracture his presence, creating an illusion of himself. Illusions also have a chance to fracture further. Illusions created from Phantom Lancer last for 8 seconds, while illusions created from other illusions last 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Meat Hook
abilities.description:
Launches a bloody hook toward a unit or location. The hook will snag the first unit it encounters, dragging the unit back to Pudge and dealing damage if it is an enemy.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Rot
abilities.description: A toxic cloud that deals intense damage and slows movement--harming not only enemy units but Pudge himself.

abilities.name: Flesh Heap
abilities.description: Gives Pudge resistance to magic damage, as well as bonus strength that increases each time Pudge kills an enemy Hero or it dies in his vicinity.  Flesh Heap is retroactive, meaning it can gain charges before it is skilled, which then become active.

abilities.name: Dismember
abilities.description: CHANNELED - Pudge chows down on an enemy unit, disabling it and dealing damage over time. Pudge gets healed for the same amount he damages. Lasts 3 seconds on Heroes, 6 seconds on creeps.

abilities.name: Plasma Field
abilities.description: Releases a wave of energetic plasma that grows in power as it expands, but also zaps on contraction, dealing damage to enemy units caught in its path. Damage increases with distance from Razor.

abilities.name: Static Link
abilities.description: Creates a charged link between Razor and an enemy Hero, stealing damage from the target and giving it to Razor.

abilities.name: Unstable Current
abilities.description:
Razor moves with increased speed, and any abilities targeted at him are instantly countered with a jolt of electricity which damages, slows, and purges buffs from enemies.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

abilities.name: Eye of the Storm
abilities.description:
A powerful lightning storm strikes out at enemy units with the lowest health, dealing damage and reducing their armor.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Burrowstrike
abilities.description:
Sand King burrows into the ground and tunnels forward, damaging and stunning enemy units above him as he resurfaces.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Sand Storm
abilities.description: CHANNELED - Sand King creates a fearsome sandstorm that damages enemy units while hiding him from vision.  The invisibility remains for a short duration after the sandstorm ends.

abilities.name: Caustic Finale
abilities.description: Sand King's attacks inject a venom that causes enemy units to violently explode when its timer expires, or when the unit dies, damaging and slowing nearby enemies. Deals less damage if its timer expires.

abilities.name: Epicenter
abilities.description: CHANNELED - After channeling for 2 seconds, Sand King sends a disturbance into the earth, causing it to shudder violently. All enemies caught within range will take damage and become slowed. Each subsequent pulse increases the radius of damage dealt.

abilities.name: Static Remnant
abilities.description: Creates an explosively charged image of Storm Spirit that lasts 12 seconds and will detonate and deal damage if an enemy unit comes near it.

abilities.name: Electric Vortex
abilities.description:
A vortex that pulls an enemy unit to Storm Spirit's location, it also slows the Storm Spirit by 50% for 3 seconds.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Overload
abilities.description: Casting a spell creates an electrical charge, which is released in a burst on his next attack, dealing damage and slowing nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Ball Lightning
abilities.description: Storm Spirit becomes volatile electricity, charging across the battlefield until he depletes his mana or reaches his target. The activation mana cost is 30+8% of his total mana pool, and the cost per 100 units traveled is 12+0.7% of his total mana pool.  Damage is expressed in damage per 100 units traveled.

abilities.name: Storm Hammer
abilities.description: Sven unleashes his magical gauntlet that deals damage and stuns enemy units.

abilities.name: Great Cleave
abilities.description: Sven strikes with great force, cleaving all nearby enemy units with his attack.

abilities.name: Warcry
abilities.description: Sven's Warcry heartens his allies for battle, increasing their movement speed and armor.  Lasts 8 seconds.

abilities.name: God's Strength
abilities.description:
Sven channels his rogue strength, granting bonus damage for 25 seconds.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Avalanche
abilities.description: Bombards an area with rocks, stunning and damaging enemy land units.

abilities.name: Toss
abilities.description: Grabs the nearest unit in a 275 radius around Tiny, ally or enemy, and launches it at the target unit or rune to deal damage where they land.  If the tossed unit is an enemy, it will take an extra 20% damage. Toss does more damage with each level in Grow.

abilities.name: Craggy Exterior
abilities.description: Causes damage to bounce back on Tiny's attackers. Melee enemies that attack Tiny have a chance of being stunned. The proc chance improves with each level in Grow.

abilities.name: Grow
abilities.description:
Tiny gains craggy mass that increases his power at the cost of his attack speed. Increases Tossed unit damage and improves movement speed, and improves Craggy Exterior proc chance.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Shackleshot
abilities.description: Shackles the target to an enemy unit or tree in a line directly behind it.  If no unit or tree is present, the stun duration is reduced to 0.75.

abilities.name: Powershot
abilities.description: Windranger charges her bow for up to 1 second for a single powerful shot, which deals more damage the longer it is charged. The arrow damages enemies and destroys trees along its path. For each enemy that Powershot hits, its damage is reduced by 20%.

abilities.name: Windrun
abilities.description: Increases movement speed and adds evasion from all physical attacks, while slowing movement of nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Focus Fire
abilities.description:
Windranger channels the wind to gain 500 additional attack speed against a single enemy unit or structure, though with a reduction to her attack damage.  Extra damage from secondary item effects is not reduced.  Lasts 20 seconds.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Arc Lightning
abilities.description: Hurls a bolt of lightning that leaps through nearby enemy units.

abilities.name: Lightning Bolt
abilities.description: Calls down a bolt of lightning to strike an enemy unit, causing damage and a mini-stun. When cast, Lightning Bolt briefly provides unobstructed vision and True Sight around the target in a 750 radius. Can be cast on the ground, affecting the closest enemy hero in 325 range.

abilities.name: Static Field
abilities.description: Zeus shocks all nearby enemy units whenever he casts a spell, causing damage proportional to their current health.

abilities.name: Nimbus
abilities.description: Creates a storm cloud anywhere on the map that automatically casts Lightning Bolt on nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Thundergod's Wrath
abilities.description: Strikes all enemy heroes with a bolt of lightning, no matter where they may be.  Thundergod's Wrath also provides True Sight around each hero struck.  If an enemy hero is invisible, it takes no damage, but the True Sight is still created at that hero's location.

abilities.name: Torrent
abilities.description: Summons a rising torrent that, after a short delay, hurls enemy units into the sky, stunning, dealing damage and slowing movement speed.

abilities.name: Tidebringer
abilities.description: Kunkka's legendary sword grants increased damage and cleaves a large area of effect in front of him for a single strike.

abilities.name: X Marks the Spot
abilities.description: Targets a friendly or enemy Hero, marks their position with an X, and returns them to it after several seconds.  Kunkka can trigger the return at any time during the duration. Lasts twice as long on allied heroes.

abilities.name: Ghostship
abilities.description:
Summons a ghostly ship that sails through the battle before smashing apart, damaging and stunning all enemies caught near the wreckage. Allied heroes touched by the Ghostship are given a swig of The Admiral's Rum, receiving bonus movement speed and a delayed reaction to incoming damage.

Upgradeable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Return
abilities.description: Returns the marked hero to the X.

abilities.name: Dragon Slave
abilities.description: Lina channels the breath of a dragon, sending out a wave of fire that scorches every enemy in its path.

abilities.name: Light Strike Array
abilities.description: Summons a column of flames that damages and stuns enemies.

abilities.name: Fiery Soul
abilities.description: Grants bonus attack and movement speed each time Lina casts a spell. Stacks with itself. Lasts 10 seconds.

abilities.name: Laguna Blade
abilities.description:
Fires off a bolt of lightning at a single enemy unit, dealing massive damage.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Earth Spike
abilities.description: Rock spikes burst from the earth along a straight path. Enemy units are hurled into the air, then are stunned and take damage when they fall.

abilities.name: Hex
abilities.description: Transforms an enemy unit into a harmless beast, with all special abilities disabled.

abilities.name: Mana Drain
abilities.description: CHANNELED - Absorbs the magical energies of a target enemy unit by taking mana from it every second.

abilities.name: Finger of Death
abilities.description:
Rips at an enemy unit, trying to turn it inside-out. Deals massive damage.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Ether Shock
abilities.description: Creates a cone of ethereal energy that strikes multiple enemy units.

abilities.name: Hex
abilities.description: Transforms an enemy unit into a harmless creature, disabling their attacks and abilities.

abilities.name: Shackles
abilities.description: CHANNELED - Magically binds an enemy unit so that it cannot move or attack, while dealing damage over time.

abilities.name: Mass Serpent Ward
abilities.description:
Summons 10 Serpent Wards to attack enemy units and structures. The Wards are immune to magic. It takes two hits to destroy a single Ward.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Guardian Sprint
abilities.description: Slardar slithers ahead, moving significantly faster and passing through units, though becoming more vulnerable to damage.

abilities.name: Slithereen Crush
abilities.description: Slams the ground, stunning and damaging nearby enemy land units.  After the stun, the affected units are slowed.

abilities.name: Bash of the Deep
abilities.description: Grants a chance that an attack will do bonus damage and stun an enemy.  The duration is doubled against creeps.

abilities.name: Corrosive Haze
abilities.description: Reduces enemy armor to amplify physical damage and provides True Sight of the targeted unit, revealing invisibility.

abilities.name: Gush
abilities.description:
Summons a gush of water to damage an enemy unit, reducing their movement speed and armor.  Lasts 4 seconds.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Kraken Shell
abilities.description:
Thickens Tidehunter's hide to passively block a portion of any incoming physical attack damage. The hide also removes negative status effects if the damage taken crosses a threshold.

Does not stack with items that provide Damage Block.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel

abilities.name: Anchor Smash
abilities.description: Tidehunter swings his mighty anchor to damage nearby enemies and reduce their attack damage.

abilities.name: Ravage
abilities.description: Slams the ground, causing tentacles to erupt in all directions, damaging and stunning all nearby enemy units.

abilities.name: Paralyzing Cask
abilities.description: Launches a cask of paralyzing powder that ricochets between enemy units, stunning and damaging those it hits.

abilities.name: Voodoo Restoration
abilities.description: Witch Doctor focuses his magic to heal nearby allied units.

abilities.name: Maledict
abilities.description: Curses all enemy Heroes in a small area, causing them to take a set amount of damage each second, as well as bursts of damage every 4 seconds based on how much health they have lost since the curse began.

abilities.name: Death Ward
abilities.description:
CHANNELED - Summons a deadly ward with true strike to attack enemy heroes within 700 range. Lasts a maximum of 8 seconds.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Frost Blast
abilities.description: Blasts the target enemy unit with damaging frost, dealing area damage and slowing movement and attack rates for 4 seconds.  The primary target takes the most damage.

abilities.name: Ice Armor
abilities.description: Creates a shield around the target friendly unit or building, which adds armor and slows attacking units. Lasts 40 seconds.

abilities.name: Sacrifice
abilities.description: Sacrifices a friendly creep and converts its current hit points into mana for Lich.

abilities.name: Chain Frost
abilities.description:
Releases an orb of frost that bounces between nearby enemy units up to 10,10,10 times, slowing and damaging each time it hits.  The first target is mini-stunned.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Smoke Screen
abilities.description: Throws down a smoke bomb, silencing enemies, and causing them to miss most attacks, as well as slowing movement.

abilities.name: Blink Strike
abilities.description: Teleports behind the target unit, striking for bonus damage if it is an enemy.

abilities.name: Cloak and Dagger
abilities.description: Riki fades into the shadows, becoming invisible. Every time Riki strikes his enemy from behind, he deals bonus damage based on his Agility. When Riki attacks, he becomes visible.

abilities.name: Tricks of the Trade
abilities.description:
CHANNELED - Phases out of the world while striking every enemy from behind in a 500 AoE once per second.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Malefice
abilities.description: Focuses Enigma's power on a target, causing it to take damage and become repeatedly stunned for multiple instances.  An instance strikes every 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Demonic Conversion
abilities.description: Transforms a creep into three fragments of Enigma himself.  These eidolons are all under Enigma's control, and repeated successful attacks cause them to multiply.  When this happens, the eidolons have their health restored.

abilities.name: Midnight Pulse
abilities.description: Steeps an area in dark resonance, damaging enemy units based on their max HP.

abilities.name: Black Hole
abilities.description:
CHANNELED - Summons a vortex that sucks in nearby enemy units.  Enemies affected by Black Hole cannot move, attack, or cast spells.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Laser
abilities.description:
Fires an intense energy beam, dealing damage and blinding the target, causing it to miss all physical attacks. 

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Heat-Seeking Missile
abilities.description:
Launches a pair of rockets at the nearest visible enemy heroes within 2500 range. 

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: March of the Machines
abilities.description: Enlists an army of robotic minions to destroy enemy units in an area around Tinker.

abilities.name: Rearm
abilities.description: CHANNELED - Resets the cooldown on most of Tinker's items and abilities.

abilities.name: Shrapnel
abilities.description: Consumes a charge to launch a ball of shrapnel that showers the target area in explosive pellets. Enemies are subject to damage and slowed movement. Reveals the targeted area. Shrapnel charges restore every 55 seconds.

abilities.name: Headshot
abilities.description: Sniper increases his accuracy, giving him a chance to deal extra damage and briefly stop the movements of his enemies.

abilities.name: Take Aim
abilities.description: Extends the attack range of Sniper's rifle.

abilities.name: Assassinate
abilities.description:
Sniper locks onto a target enemy unit and, after 2 seconds, fires a devastating shot that deals damage at long range, and mini-stuns the target.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Death Pulse
abilities.description: Necrophos releases a wave of death around him, dealing damage to enemy units and healing allied units. Passively provides regen for 7 seconds for each unit Necrophos kills.

abilities.name: Ghost Shroud
abilities.description: Necrophos slips into the realm that separates the living from the dead. Unable to attack or be attacked, he emits an aura that slows enemies around him. He takes additional magic damage in this form, but his restorative powers are amplified.

abilities.name: Heartstopper Aura
abilities.description: Necrophos stills the hearts of his opponents, causing nearby enemy units to lose a percentage of their max health over time.

abilities.name: Reaper's Scythe
abilities.description:
Stuns the target enemy hero, then deals damage based on how much life it is missing. Heroes killed by Reaper's Scythe will have 10,20,30 seconds added to their respawn timer. Any kill under this effect is credited to Necrophos.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Fatal Bonds
abilities.description: Binds several enemy units together, causing 25% of the damage dealt to one of them to be felt by the others.

abilities.name: Shadow Word
abilities.description: Warlock whispers an incantation, healing a friendly unit or damaging an enemy unit over time.

abilities.name: Upheaval
abilities.description: CHANNELED - A powerful slowing current that grows stronger as it's channelled. Lasts up to 16 seconds.  Enemies are slowed for 3 seconds after leaving the area or the spell ends.

abilities.name: Chaotic Offering
abilities.description:
Summons a Golem from the depths, stunning enemies for one second. The Golem lives 60 seconds, takes reduced damage from spells, has Permanent Immolation and Flaming Fists on attack.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Shadow Strike
abilities.description: Hurls a poisoned dagger which deals large initial damage, and then deals damage over time. The poisoned unit has its movement speed slowed for 15 seconds.  An instance of damage is dealt every 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Blink
abilities.description: Short distance teleportation that allows Queen of Pain to move in and out of combat.

abilities.name: Scream Of Pain
abilities.description: The Queen of Pain lets loose a piercing scream around her, damaging nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Sonic Wave
abilities.description:
Creates a gigantic wave of sound in front of Queen of Pain, dealing heavy damage to all enemy units in its wake.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Venomous Gale
abilities.description: Launches a ball of venom in a line, poisoning enemy units so that they take both initial damage and damage over time, as well as suffering slowed movement.  Venomous Gale deals damage every 3 seconds over its duration.

abilities.name: Poison Sting
abilities.description: Adds poison damage to Venomancer's normal attacks, slowing movement speed.

abilities.name: Plague Ward
abilities.description: Summons a plague ward to attack enemy units and structures. The ward is immune to magic. Wards gain the Poison Sting level from Venomancer, dealing 50% of the full damage.

abilities.name: Poison Nova
abilities.description:
A spreading ring of poison that does damage over time to enemy units around Venomancer.  Poison Nova cannot deal lethal damage; targets will be left with at least 1 health.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Time Walk
abilities.description: Rushes to a target location while backtracking any damage taken the last 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Time Dilation
abilities.description: Faceless Void traps all nearby enemies in a time dilation field for 6,8,10,12 seconds, freezing their cooldowns and slowing their movement and attack speed by 14% for each cooldown frozen.

abilities.name: Time Lock
abilities.description: Adds the chance for an attack to lock an enemy unit in time, stunning it and dealing bonus damage.

abilities.name: Chronosphere
abilities.description:
Creates a blister in spacetime, trapping all units caught in its sphere of influence and causes you to move very quickly inside it.  Only Faceless Void and any units he controls are unaffected.  Invisible units in the sphere will be revealed.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Wraithfire Blast
abilities.description: Wraith King sears an enemy unit with spectral fire, dealing damage and stunning, then dealing damage over time and slowing the target.

abilities.name: Vampiric Aura
abilities.description: Nearby friendly units restore health based on the damage they deal when attacking enemy units.

abilities.name: Mortal Strike
abilities.description: Wraith King passively gains a chance to deal bonus damage on an attack.

abilities.name: Reincarnation
abilities.description:
Wraith King's form regroups after death, allowing him to resurrect when killed in battle.  Upon death, enemy units in a 900 radius will be slowed.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Crypt Swarm
abilities.description: Sends a swarm of winged beasts to savage enemy units in front of Death Prophet.

abilities.name: Silence
abilities.description: Prevents enemy units in a target area from casting spells.

abilities.name: Spirit Siphon
abilities.description: Creates a spirit link between Death Prophet and an enemy unit, draining 14 + 1,2.5,4,5.5% Max HP per second and slowing the enemy's movement speed by 5,10,15,20%.

abilities.name: Exorcism
abilities.description: Unleashes evil spirits to drain the life of nearby enemy units and structures. At the end of the spell's duration, Death Prophet is healed in proportion to the damage dealt.  Lasts 35 seconds.

abilities.name: Stifling Dagger
abilities.description: Throws a dagger slowing the enemy unit's movement speed, dealing 65+25,40,55,70% of Phantom Assassin's attack damage as physical damage and applying attack effects from items and abilities.

abilities.name: Phantom Strike
abilities.description: Teleports to a unit, friendly or enemy, and grants bonus attack speed while attacking if it's an enemy unit.

abilities.name: Blur
abilities.description:
Phantom Assassin focuses inward, increasing her ability to evade enemy attacks, and allowing her to blur her body to disappear from the enemy team's minimap when far from enemy heroes.

Stacks diminishingly with other sources of Evasion.

abilities.name: Coup de Grace
abilities.description: Phantom Assassin refines her combat abilities, gaining a chance of delivering a devastating critical strike to enemy units. Stifling Dagger shares the same critical strike chance.

abilities.name: Nether Blast
abilities.description: An exploding pulse deals damage to enemies and structures in the area.  Deals half damage to structures.

abilities.name: Decrepify
abilities.description: A powerful banishing spell that slows a unit and renders it unable to attack or be attacked. Afflicted units take extra magic damage.

abilities.name: Nether Ward
abilities.description: Pugna places a Nether Ward at the target location. The ward reduces the mana regeneration of nearby enemy heroes, and will fire at any enemy hero who casts a spell. Nether Ward deals damage equal to the damage multiplier times the mana spent by the enemy hero.

abilities.name: Life Drain
abilities.description:
CHANNELED - When cast on an enemy, Pugna drains health from the target enemy unit to heal himself and granting vision over the target. If Pugna has full HP, and the enemy target is a Hero, Life Drain will restore mana instead.

When cast on an ally, Pugna will drain his own health into his ally.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Poison Attack
abilities.description: Intensifies Viper's venom, adding an effect to his normal attack that slows attack and movement speed while dealing damage over time.

abilities.name: Nethertoxin
abilities.description: Nethertoxin causes Viper's normal attack to deal bonus damage to units based on how much health they are missing.  The bonus damage doubles for each 20% of health missing from the target.  Nethertoxin deals half damage to creeps and buildings.

abilities.name: Corrosive Skin
abilities.description: Viper exudes an infectious toxin that damages and slows any enemy that damages it in a 1400 radius. The acid exudate also increases Viper's resistance to magic.

abilities.name: Viper Strike
abilities.description:
Viper slows the targeted enemy unit's movement and attack speed while also dealing poison damage over time.  The slowing effect reduces over the duration of the poison.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Lucent Beam
abilities.description: Calls a beam of lunar energy down upon an enemy, damaging and briefly stunning them.

abilities.name: Moon Glaive
abilities.description: Empowers Luna's glaive, causing her attacks to bounce between enemy units. Deals less damage with each bounce.

abilities.name: Lunar Blessing
abilities.description: Increases the damage dealt by attacks from Luna and nearby allied heroes. Luna is also blessed with increased vision range at night.

abilities.name: Eclipse
abilities.description:
Showers random nearby enemies with strikes from Luna's current level of Lucent Beam. These beams do not stun their targets, and there is a maximum number of times that a single target can be struck. Also turns day into night for 10 seconds.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Breathe Fire
abilities.description: Unleashes a breath of fire in front of Dragon Knight that burns enemies and reduces the damage their attacks deal.

abilities.name: Dragon Tail
abilities.description: Dragon Knight smites an enemy unit in melee range with his shield, stunning it while dealing minor damage.  When in Elder Dragon Form, the cast range increases to 400.

abilities.name: Dragon Blood
abilities.description: The life blood of the Dragon improves health regeneration and strengthens armor.

abilities.name: Elder Dragon Form
abilities.description:
Dragon Knight takes the form of one of three powerful elder dragons, increasing his speed, and Dragon Tail's range, while granting him new powers.
LEVEL 1 Green Dragon - Corrosive Breath: attacks deal 20 poison damage per second for 5 seconds. Works on structures.
LEVEL 2 Red Dragon - Splash Attack: attacks damage all enemy units in a 300 radius, with Corrosive Breath added to the targets.
LEVEL 3 Blue Dragon - Frost Breath: slows movement speed by 30% and attack speed by 30 of enemy units in Splash Attack range for 3 seconds, with Corrosive Breath added to the targets.

abilities.name: Poison Touch
abilities.description:
Casts a poisonous spell on an enemy unit, gradually slowing movement, and causing damage over time.
LEVEL 1 - Slows the target by 33% for 3 seconds.
LEVEL 2 - Slows the target by 33% for 2 seconds, then by 66% for 1 second.
LEVEL 3 - Slows the target by 33%, 66%, and 100%, for 1 second each.
LEVEL 4 - Slows the target by 33% for 1 second, then 66% for 1 second, then stuns for 1 second.

abilities.name: Shallow Grave
abilities.description:
An ally blessed with Shallow Grave, no matter how close to death, cannot die while under its protection.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Shadow Wave
abilities.description: Sends out a bolt of power that arcs between allies, healing them while damaging any units standing nearby.  Dazzle is always healed by Shadow Wave.

abilities.name: Weave
abilities.description: Applies a buff that increases the armor of allied heroes while decreasing the armor of enemy heroes in the target area over time.

abilities.name: Battery Assault
abilities.description: Discharges high-powered shrapnel at random nearby enemy units, dealing minor magical damage and ministun.

abilities.name: Power Cogs
abilities.description: Forms a barrier of energized cogs around Clockwerk, trapping any units that are near.  Enemies outside the trap that touch a cog are knocked back, losing health and mana. Once a cog has delivered a shock, it will power down.  Cogs can be destroyed by enemy attacks, but Clockwerk can destroy them with just one.

abilities.name: Rocket Flare
abilities.description: Fires a global range flare that explodes over a given area, damaging enemies and providing vision for 10 seconds.

abilities.name: Hookshot
abilities.description:
Fires a grappling device rapidly at the target location.  If the hook hits a unit, Clockwerk launches himself into the target, stunning and dealing damage.  Any enemies Clockwerk collides with along the way are damaged and stunned.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Split Earth
abilities.description: Splits the earth under enemies. Deals damage and stuns for a short duration.

abilities.name: Diabolic Edict
abilities.description: Saturates the area around Leshrac with magical explosions that deal physical damage to enemy units and structures.  The fewer units available to attack, the more damage those units will take.  Deals 40% more damage to towers.  Lasts 10 seconds.

abilities.name: Lightning Storm
abilities.description:
Summons a lightning storm that blasts the target enemy unit, then strikes any nearby enemy units. Struck enemies are slowed.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Pulse Nova
abilities.description: Creates waves of damaging energy around Leshrac, one per second, to damage nearby enemy units.

abilities.name: Sprout
abilities.description: Sprouts a ring of trees around a unit, trapping it in place.

abilities.name: Teleportation
abilities.description: Teleports to any point on the map.

abilities.name: Nature's Call
abilities.description: Converts an area of trees into Treants. Treants have 550 health and deal 30-34 damage.

abilities.name: Wrath of Nature
abilities.description:
Damaging energy bounces around the map, striking enemies close to the cast point that are in vision. Each enemy hit beyond the first adds damage.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Rage
abilities.description:
Launch into a maddened rage, becoming Spell Immune, 100% resistant to magic damage, and gaining increased attack speed.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

abilities.name: Feast
abilities.description: Lifestealer's attacks damage enemies and heal himself for a percentage of his target's current health.

abilities.name: Open Wounds
abilities.description: Lifestealer rends an enemy unit, slowing the victim's movement speed and allowing all allies to regain health for a percentage of the damage they deal to that unit. All damage dealt will steal life, including damage from spells. The victim recovers movement speed over the duration.

abilities.name: Assimilate
abilities.description:
Lifestealer swallows an allied hero, allowing them to hide within him. Any healing Lifestealer receives is shared with the hero within. When an assimilated hero leaves Lifestealer, they erupt outward, damaging nearby enemies.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel

abilities.name: Eject
abilities.description: Ejects an Assimilated hero, damaging nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Infest
abilities.description:
Lifestealer infests the body of a target unit, becoming undetectable inside. He can then explode from the host body, dealing damage to nearby enemies. If the infested unit is an enemy creep or a neutral creep, he can take control of the unit's ability to move and attack, and when consumed the creep will heal Lifestealer's health equal to the creep's current health.  Does not work on enemy heroes.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

abilities.name: Control
abilities.description: Lifestealer seizes control of the host body's nervous system, allowing him to issue movement and attack orders from within.  Controlled units share Lifestealer's movement speed.  Cannot be used on heroes.

abilities.name: Consume
abilities.description: Lifestealer eats the host body from the inside out, exploding from within.

abilities.name: Vacuum
abilities.description: Dark Seer creates a vacuum over the target area that sucks in enemy units, disrupting them and dealing damage.

abilities.name: Ion Shell
abilities.description: Surrounds the target unit with a bristling shield that damages enemy units in an area around it.

abilities.name: Surge
abilities.description: Charges a target friendly unit with power, giving it a brief burst of maximum movement speed.

abilities.name: Wall of Replica
abilities.description:
Raises a wall of warping light that slows and creates replicas of any enemy hero who crosses it. Enemy replicas serve at the Dark Seer's will. Replicas last until they are destroyed, or until the wall's duration ends.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Strafe
abilities.description: Clinkz attacks with a barrage of arrows.  Dramatically increases attack speed for a short time.

abilities.name: Searing Arrows
abilities.description: Imbues Clinkz's arrows with fire for extra damage.

abilities.name: Skeleton Walk
abilities.description: Clinkz moves invisibly through units until the moment he attacks or uses an ability.

abilities.name: Death Pact
abilities.description: Clinkz consumes the target friendly or enemy creep, gaining a percent of its hitpoints as max health and damage.

abilities.name: Purification
abilities.description: Instantly heals a friendly unit and damages all nearby enemy units.

abilities.name: Repel
abilities.description:
Creates a divine barrier around an ally which grants them Spell Immunity and 100% resistance to Magic Damage.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

abilities.name: Degen Aura
abilities.description: Greatly degenerates the movement and attack capabilities of enemy units that stray too near.

abilities.name: Guardian Angel
abilities.description:
Omniknight summons a Guardian Angel that grants immunity from physical damage.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter

abilities.name: Untouchable
abilities.description: Enchantress beguiles her enemies, slowing their attacks when she is attacked.

abilities.name: Enchant
abilities.description: Enchantress charms an enemy. If the enemy is a hero, they are slowed. If the enemy is a creep, she brings it under her control. If cast on a creep already under her control, she refreshes its enchant duration.

abilities.name: Nature's Attendants
abilities.description: A cloud of wisps heals Enchantress and any friendly units nearby. Lasts 11 seconds.

abilities.name: Impetus
abilities.description:
Places an enchantment on each attack while activated, causing it to deal additional damage based on how far away the target is.  The farther the target, the greater the damage dealt.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Inner Vitality
abilities.description: Unlocks the regenerative power of a friendly unit, with healing based upon its primary attribute. If the target is below 35%, it will heal faster.  Lasts 16 seconds.

abilities.name: Burning Spear
abilities.description: Huskar sets his spears aflame, dealing damage over time with his regular attack.  Multiple attacks will stack additional damage.  Each attack drains some of Huskar's health.  Lasts 8 seconds.

abilities.name: Berserker's Blood
abilities.description: Huskar's injuries feed his power, giving increased attack speed and magic damage resistance based on missing health.

abilities.name: Life Break
abilities.description:
Huskar draws upon his health to break an enemy's life, leaping at a target within attack range to shatter a percentage of that hero's current health, and slowing them.  While leaping, Huskar is Spell Immune.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Void
abilities.description: Creates a damaging void that slows an enemy unit and deals damage.  Void also mini-stuns, interrupting channeling abilities. The slowing effect lasts longer at night.

abilities.name: Crippling Fear
abilities.description: Night Stalker horrifies the target enemy Hero, causing it to miss attacks and become silenced.  The effect lasts longer at night.

abilities.name: Hunter in the Night
abilities.description: Night Stalker is in his element at night, attacking and moving with great swiftness. Can be activated during night to grant Night Stalker flying movement for 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Darkness
abilities.description:
Night Stalker smothers the sun and summons instant darkness, so that he might use his powers at their fullest. While Darkness is in effect, enemy heroes, units, wards and buildings have their vision range reduced to 675. 

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Spawn Spiderlings
abilities.description: Broodmother injects her young into an enemy unit, dealing damage. The spiderlings will hatch if the target is killed while under this influence.

abilities.name: Spin Web
abilities.description: Spins a large web that renders Broodmother invisible, grants a passive movement speed increase, gives free movement, and boosts regeneration while in its vicinity. Spin Web charges restore every 40 seconds. If damage is taken, free movement is disabled and the movement speed increase is halved for 6 seconds. Spin Web can be cast from anywhere as long as the new web touches an existing web. Webs never expire, and can be manually destroyed. When the maximum limit of webs is exceeded, the oldest web disappears.

abilities.name: Incapacitating Bite
abilities.description: Broodmother's venom cripples enemy units, causing her attacks to slow and giving the affected unit a chance to miss its attacks.

abilities.name: Insatiable Hunger
abilities.description: A violent lust for vital fluids increases Broodmother's attack damage and gives her a vampiric attack.

abilities.name: Shuriken Toss
abilities.description:
Hurls a deadly shuriken at an enemy unit, dealing damage and mini-stunning the target.  The shuriken will bounce between any Tracked units who are within a 1200 radius of each other.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Jinada
abilities.description: Bounty Hunter plans his next hit, passively adding a critical strike and maim to his next attack.

abilities.name: Shadow Walk
abilities.description: Bounty Hunter becomes invisible and gains the ability to move through other units until he attacks or uses an ability.  If he breaks the invisibility with an attack, that attack will deal bonus damage.

abilities.name: Track
abilities.description: Tracks an enemy hero, granting True Sight of the target, and information on how much gold it is carrying. Allies near the hunted are granted bonus movement speed. If the target dies, Bounty Hunter and nearby heroes collect a bonus bounty of gold.

abilities.name: The Swarm
abilities.description: Weaver launches a swarm of 12 young Weavers that latch on any enemy unit in their path, attacking and reducing armor until it is killed.

abilities.name: Shukuchi
abilities.description: Weaver shifts out of visibility, gaining the ability to move at maximum speed through physical units--doing harm to any enemies it passes through.

abilities.name: Geminate Attack
abilities.description: Allows Weaver to dispatch two attacks at once.

abilities.name: Time Lapse
abilities.description:
Weaver warps backward to whatever position it was in five seconds earlier--regaining the HP and mana from that time. No effect on cooldown, gold or experience.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel

abilities.name: Dual Breath
abilities.description: An icy blast followed by a wave of fire launches out in a path in front of Jakiro. The ice slows enemies, while the fire delivers damage over time.

abilities.name: Ice Path
abilities.description: Creates a path of ice that stuns and damages enemies that touch it.

abilities.name: Liquid Fire
abilities.description: Jakiro burns his enemies in an area of effect with fire added to his attack, while slowing their attacks.

abilities.name: Macropyre
abilities.description:
Jakiro exhales a wide line of lasting flames, which deals damage per second to any enemy units caught in the fire.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Sticky Napalm
abilities.description: Drenches an area in sticky oil, amplifying damage from Batrider's attacks and abilities and slowing the movement speed and turn rate of enemies in the area.  Additional casts of Sticky Napalm continue to increase damage, up to 10 stacks.  The extra damage is halved against creeps.

abilities.name: Flamebreak
abilities.description: Hurls an explosive cocktail that explodes when it reaches the target location, knocking back, and dealing damage over time to enemies in the area.

abilities.name: Firefly
abilities.description: Batrider takes to the skies, laying down a trail of flames from the air.  The fire damages any enemies it touches, and destroys trees below Batrider. While flying, Batrider gains unobstructed movement and vision.

abilities.name: Flaming Lasso
abilities.description:
Lassoes an enemy and drags them in Batrider's wake.  Victims cannot be dragged over impassable terrain. Dragged units cannot move, attack, or use abilities.  Teleporting or blinking will break the lasso.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Cold Feet
abilities.description: Places a frozen hex on an enemy unit that deals damage over time, but can be dispelled by moving away from the initial cast point.  If the enemy unit doesn't move outside of the given range, it will be stunned and frozen in place after 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Ice Vortex
abilities.description: Creates a vortex of icy energy that slows movement speed and increases magic damage done in its range. Lasts 16 seconds.

abilities.name: Chilling Touch
abilities.description: A frigid gust enchants allied heroes, granting them bonus magical damage for a given number of physical attacks, while slowing their attack speed slightly.  Ancient Apparition always receives the buff. Lasts 30 seconds.

abilities.name: Ice Blast
abilities.description:
Launches a tracer toward any location on the battlefield, which must be triggered again to mark the area to be blasted by a damaging explosion of hail. The further the tracer travels, the larger the explosion will be. Enemies caught in the explosion, or who touch the icy ball of hail as it travels, are Frostbitten, taking damage and prevented from regenerating or healing. If a Frostbitten unit's health drops below a certain percentage, they will instantly shatter.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Release
abilities.description: Releases the ice blast to explode at the tracer's current location.

abilities.name: Earthshock
abilities.description: Ursa slams the earth, causing a powerful shock to damage and slow all enemy units in a nearby area for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Overpower
abilities.description: Using his skill in combat, Ursa gains increased attack speed for a number of subsequent attacks.

abilities.name: Fury Swipes
abilities.description: Ursa's claws dig deeper wounds in the enemy, causing consecutive attacks to the same enemy to deal more damage.  If the same target is not attacked after 15 seconds, the bonus damage is lost.

abilities.name: Enrage
abilities.description:
Ursa goes into a frenzy, multiplying his Fury Swipes damage and causing him to take 80% less damage. Removes any existing debuffs.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Charge of Darkness
abilities.description: Spirit Breaker fixes his sight on an enemy unit and starts charging through all objects.  All enemy units passed through and the targeted unit will be hit by a Greater Bash.  If the targeted unit dies, Spirit Breaker will change his target to the nearest enemy unit to that location.

abilities.name: Empowering Haste
abilities.description: Causes Spirit Breaker to gain power with higher movement speed. His presence increases the movement speed of nearby allied units. Can be cast to improve the movement speed bonus for 6 seconds, however afterward the passive bonus will be halved while the ability is on cooldown.

abilities.name: Greater Bash
abilities.description: Gives a chance to stun and knockback an enemy unit on an attack, as well as gaining bonus movement speed after a bash occurs. Deals a percentage of movement speed as damage.

abilities.name: Nether Strike
abilities.description:
Spirit Breaker slips into the nether realm, reappearing next to his hapless victim. Upon reappearing, a Greater Bash of the current level occurs and deals bonus damage.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Rocket Barrage
abilities.description: Launches a salvo of rockets at nearby enemy units in a radius around the Gyrocopter.  Lasts 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Homing Missile
abilities.description: Fires a homing missile to seek the targeted enemy unit. The missile gains speed over time, dealing damage and stunning when it impacts the target.  Homing Missile deals greater damage the further it has traveled.  Enemy units can destroy the missile before it reaches its target.

abilities.name: Flak Cannon
abilities.description: Gyrocopter's attacks hit all enemy units in an area around it for a limited number of attacks.  Only the main target of attacks will receive attack bonuses such as Critical Strike.  Lasts 15 seconds or until the attacks are used.

abilities.name: Call Down
abilities.description:
Call down an aerial missile strike on enemy units in a target area.  Two missiles arrive in succession, the first dealing major damage and minor slow for 2 seconds; the second dealing minor damage and major slow for 4 seconds.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Acid Spray
abilities.description: Sprays high-pressure acid across a target area. Enemy units who step across the contaminated terrain take damage per second and have their armor reduced.

abilities.name: Unstable Concoction
abilities.description: Alchemist brews up an unstable concoction that he can throw at an enemy hero, to stun and deal damage in an area around the explosion. The longer the concoction brews, the more damage it deals and the longer the stun. After 5 seconds, the brew reaches its maximum damage and stun time. However, after 5.5 seconds, the concoction will explode on Alchemist himself if not thrown.

abilities.name: Greevil's Greed
abilities.description: Alchemist synthesizes additional gold from his enemies and bounty runes. With each kill, Alchemist earns base bonus gold and extra bonus gold. If Alchemist kills another unit which yields gold within the next 30 seconds, an additional instance of Extra Bonus Gold is added to the total. Additionally, causes bounty runes to yield 2.5 times their normal gold.

abilities.name: Chemical Rage
abilities.description: Alchemist causes his Ogre to enter a chemically induced rage, reducing base attack cooldown and increasing movement speed and regeneration.

abilities.name: Unstable Concoction Throw
abilities.description: Throw it before it blows up!

abilities.name: Arcane Curse
abilities.description: Curses the target area, causing enemy heroes to take damage and slowing their movement speed. Anytime affected enemies cast a spell, the duration is increased.

abilities.name: Glaives of Wisdom
abilities.description:
Silencer enchants his glaives with his wisdom, dealing additional damage based on his Intelligence.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Last Word
abilities.description: Enchants a target, causing them to be damaged and silenced if they cast a spell or if the enchantment timer expires.

abilities.name: Global Silence
abilities.description: Silencer stops all sound, preventing enemy heroes and units on the map from casting spells.

abilities.name: Arcane Orb
abilities.description:
Adds extra pure damage to Outworld Devourer's attacks, based on his remaining mana pool. Steals 1,2,3,4 intelligence for 80 seconds per hit when attacking an enemy hero. Arcane Orb also does bonus damage to summoned units and illusions.

Arcane Orb is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.

abilities.name: Astral Imprisonment
abilities.description:
Places a target unit into an astral prison. The hidden unit is invulnerable and disabled. When the astral prison implodes, it deals 100,175,250,325 damage to enemies in a 400 radius around the target.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Essence Aura
abilities.description: Whenever nearby allied Heroes or Outworld Devourer itself casts a spell, it gains a chance to restore a percentage of its mana pool.  Outworld Devourer also passively gains a bonus to its base mana pool.  Several skills with no cooldown and toggled spells cannot trigger Essence Aura.

abilities.name: Sanity's Eclipse
abilities.description: Unleashes a psychic blast that removes 40% of the mana from affected heroes, while also damaging them based on the difference between the affected hero's Intelligence and Outworld Devourer's. If an enemy hero has the same or higher Intelligence than Outworld Devourer, Sanity's Eclipse will not cause damage. Sanity's Eclipse can hit units trapped by Astral Imprisonment.

abilities.name: Summon Wolves
abilities.description: Summons two wolves to fight for Lycan.  Level 3-4 wolves have Cripple, and level 4 wolves have permanent invisibility.

abilities.name: Howl
abilities.description: Grants bonus damage and bonus health to Lycan, all allied heroes and all units under their control. Howl has double effect during night.

abilities.name: Feral Impulse
abilities.description: Increases the HP regeneration and damage of Lycan and all units under his control.

abilities.name: Shapeshift
abilities.description: Lycan assumes his lupine form, granting him and his units critical strikes and added vision at night. During Shapeshift, Lycan and all units under his control move at increased speed, cannot be slowed and have a 40% chance to deal a critical strike doing 160,180,200% damage.

abilities.name: Thunder Clap
abilities.description: Slams the ground, dealing damage and slowing the movement speed and attack rate of nearby enemy land units.

abilities.name: Drunken Haze
abilities.description: Drenches a target in alcohol, causing their movement speed to be reduced, and causing their attacks to have a chance to miss.

abilities.name: Drunken Brawler
abilities.description:
Gives a chance to avoid attacks and to deal critical damage. Drunken Brawler will always trigger if you have not attacked, or have not been attacked, in the last several seconds.

Stacks diminishingly with other sources of Evasion.

abilities.name: Primal Split
abilities.description:
Splits Brewmaster into elements, forming 3 specialized warriors, adept at survival. If any of them survive until the end of their summoned timer, the Brewmaster is reborn.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Chaos Bolt
abilities.description: Throws a mysterious bolt of energy at the target unit. It stuns for a random duration and deals random damage.

abilities.name: Reality Rift
abilities.description: Teleports you, any images you have and the target unit to a random point along the line between the two of you. Reduces the target's armor for 8 seconds.

abilities.name: Chaos Strike
abilities.description: Each of Chaos Knight's attacks has a chance to deal bonus damage, also causing the critical strike to lifesteal for 75% of the damage .

abilities.name: Phantasm
abilities.description:
Summons several phantasmal copies of the Chaos Knight from alternate dimensions. There is a 50% chance an extra phantasm will be summoned. The phantasms deal 100,100,100% damage, but take 260% damage.

Upgradeable by Aghanim's Scepter.
DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

abilities.name: Nature's Guise
abilities.description: Turns Treant invisible when he is within 265 radius of a tree for 7,6,5,3 seconds. Increases movement speed by 10,18,26,34 while invisible, and causes a 0.4,1,1.6,2.2 seconds disarming root when attacking out of invisibility.

abilities.name: Leech Seed
abilities.description: Treant plants a life-sapping seed in an enemy unit, draining its health, while simultaneously slowing it. The seed heals friendly units around it.  Pulses 6 times.

abilities.name: Living Armor
abilities.description: Infuses the target hero or structure with a protective coating which grants bonus regeneration. Also blocks some damage from all sources. Dispels when a number of damage instances are taken.

abilities.name: Eyes In The Forest
abilities.description: Treant Protector enchants a tree, which grants him unobstructed vision in that location. If Overgrowth is cast, units within a radius of an enchanted tree will be entangled and damaged.

abilities.name: Overgrowth
abilities.description: Summons an overgrowth of vines and branches around Treant that prevent afflicted enemies from moving, blinking, going invisible, or attacking.

abilities.name: Decay
abilities.description:
Undying steals strength from all enemy heroes in an area, dealing base damage as he claims the enemy's strength for himself.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Soul Rip
abilities.description: Undying rips health away from all nearby units and uses it to heal an ally, or damage an enemy. Soul Rip can also be used to heal Tombstone.

abilities.name: Tombstone
abilities.description: Summons a tombstone at the target point.  Zombies will frequently spawn next to every enemy unit in the area around the Tombstone, and attack them.  Zombies have the Deathlust ability, which causes their attacks to slow the target, and if the target reaches below a certain amount of health, increases the attack and movement speed of the zombie.

abilities.name: Flesh Golem
abilities.description: Undying transforms into a horrifying flesh golem that possesses a Plague Aura.  This aura slows all enemy units within 750 range and amplifies the damage they take; the closer to Undying, the more damage and slow.  When a plagued unit dies, Undying is healed equal to a percentage of his own maximum health.

abilities.name: Thunder Strike
abilities.description: Repeatedly strikes the targeted unit with lightning.  Each strike damages nearby enemy units in a small radius.  Provides vision of its target.

abilities.name: Glimpse
abilities.description: Teleports the target hero back to where it was 4 seconds ago.  Instantly kills illusions.

abilities.name: Kinetic Field
abilities.description: After a short formation time, creates a circular barrier of kinetic energy that enemies can't pass.

abilities.name: Static Storm
abilities.description:
Creates a damaging static storm that also silences all enemy units in the area for the duration.  The damage starts off weak, but increases in power over the duration.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Impale
abilities.description: Rock spikes burst from the earth along a straight path. Enemy units are hurled into the air, then are stunned and take damage when they fall.

abilities.name: Mana Burn
abilities.description: Destroys the target hero's mana equal to a multiplier of its Intelligence, and deals damage equal to the mana burned.

abilities.name: Spiked Carapace
abilities.description:
When activated while above ground, Spiked Carapace reflects and negates damage dealt to Nyx Assassin (max once from each source), as well as stunning the source of the damage. Activating Spiked Carapace will not break Vendetta invisibility.

While Burrowed, Spiked Carapace instantly stuns nearby enemies when cast.

abilities.name: Burrow
abilities.description: Nyx Assassin buries himself beneath the battlefield over a short duration. Once burrowed, Spiked Carapace instantly stuns nearby enemies when cast, the range of Mana Burn and Impale is increased, and Impale's cooldown is decreased. While burrowed, Nyx Assassin is stationary, unable to attack, and invisible. His health and mana regeneration are also increased, and he gains damage reduction from all damage sources.

abilities.name: Unburrow
abilities.description: Emerge from the burrow.

abilities.name: Vendetta
abilities.description: Allows Nyx Assassin to become invisible and gain a speed bonus.  If Nyx Assassin attacks to break the invisibility, massive bonus damage is dealt with the attack.

abilities.name: Mirror Image
abilities.description:
Creates three images of Naga Siren under her control.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

abilities.name: Ensnare
abilities.description: Interrupts the target and traps them in place, preventing movement or blinking.

abilities.name: Rip Tide
abilities.description: The Naga Siren and her images hit all nearby units with a damaging wave of water that lowers armor for 8 seconds.

abilities.name: Song of the Siren
abilities.description:
All enemies in range of the Naga Siren are put into a magical stasis where they cannot act or be attacked. Using Song of the Siren again will end the duration early.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Song of the Siren End
abilities.description: Release enemy units from your song so they can be targeted again.

abilities.name: Grave Chill
abilities.description: Visage drains the movement and attack speed of the targeted unit, gaining it for itself.

abilities.name: Soul Assumption
abilities.description: Visage gathers charges of soul essence each time nearby heroes take more than 110 damage. When the essence is released, it deals base damage as well as damage for each gathered soul charge.

abilities.name: Gravekeeper's Cloak
abilities.description: Visage generates a layered barrier that protects him from damage.  If he receives damage from a player, one layer is removed, and takes time to recover.

abilities.name: Summon Familiars
abilities.description:
Conjures two blind Familiars to fight for Visage.  Familiars have high attack power, but each attack drains a charge of damage that recharges slowly over time.  Familiars possess the Stone Form ability, that allows them to turn into stone, stunning enemies upon landing.  While in Stone Form, Familiars are invulnerable, and rapidly regenerate their health.  Familiars grant high bounty when killed.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Dark Pact
abilities.description:
After a short delay, Slark sacrifices some of his life blood, purging most negative debuffs and dealing damage to enemy units around him and to himself.  Slark only takes 50% of the damage.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel

abilities.name: Pounce
abilities.description: Slark leaps forward, grabbing the first hero he connects with.  That unit takes damage and is leashed to Slark, and can only move a limited distance away from Slark's landing position.

abilities.name: Essence Shift
abilities.description: Slark steals the life essence of enemy heroes with his attacks, draining each of their attributes and converting them to bonus Agility.

abilities.name: Shadow Dance
abilities.description:
When used, Slark hides himself in a cloud of shadows, becoming immune to detection. Attacking, casting spells, and using items will not reveal Slark.  Passively, when not visible to the enemy team, Slark gains bonus movement speed and health regeneration.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Split Shot
abilities.description:
Medusa magically splits her shot into several arrows. These arrows deal a lower percent of her normal damage.

The extra targets will not receive other attack effects (such as critical strike) and Unique Attack Modifiers.

abilities.name: Mystic Snake
abilities.description:
A mystic snake made of energy jumps from target to target dealing damage and stealing mana. After it reaches its last target, it returns to Medusa to replenish her with mana. The snake deals more damage per jump and steals 11,14,17,20% of the targets' total mana. Deals Pure damage to units petrified by Stone Gaze.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Mana Shield
abilities.description: Creates a shield that absorbs 60% of the incoming damage in exchange for Medusa's mana.

abilities.name: Stone Gaze
abilities.description: Any enemy units looking at Medusa will have their movement and attack speed slowed.  If 2 seconds of total time is accumulated looking at Medusa while Stone Gaze is active, that unit will turn to stone.  Petrified units are stunned, have 100% magic damage resistance, and take bonus physical damage.  If the petrified unit is an illusion, it is immediately killed.

abilities.name: Hoof Stomp
abilities.description: Slams the ground, stunning and damaging nearby enemy units.

abilities.name: Double Edge
abilities.description: Centaur strikes a mighty blow at melee range, damaging both himself and a small area around the target.  Centaur cannot die from Double Edge.

abilities.name: Return
abilities.description: Centaur applies an aura to nearby allied units. Causes allies to counter every attack, damaging the attacker based on a percentage of Centaur's strength.

abilities.name: Stampede
abilities.description:
Centaur leads all allies into a vicious charge causing them to move through units at max speed and stop any enemy units they trample. Trampled enemies take damage based on Centaur Warrunner's strength. Each enemy can be trampled once.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Shockwave
abilities.description:
Magnus sends out a wave of force, damaging enemy units in a line.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Empower
abilities.description: Gives an allied unit bonus damage and cleave on attack.

abilities.name: Skewer
abilities.description: Magnus rushes forward, goring enemy units on his massive tusk.  Heroes hit on the way will be dragged to the destination, then damaged and slowed.

abilities.name: Reverse Polarity
abilities.description: Magnus changes properties of matter, sucking all nearby enemies in front of him and stunning them with a powerful slam and dealing damage.

abilities.name: Viscous Nasal Goo
abilities.description:
Covers a target in snot, causing it to have reduced armor and movement speed.  Multiple casts stack and refresh the duration.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Quill Spray
abilities.description: Sprays enemy units with quills dealing damage in an area of effect around Bristleback.  Deals bonus damage for every time a unit was hit by Quill Spray in the last 14 seconds.

abilities.name: Bristleback
abilities.description: Bristleback takes less damage if hit on the sides or rear.  If Bristleback takes 210 damage from the rear, he releases a Quill Spray of the current level.

abilities.name: Warpath
abilities.description:
Bristleback works himself up into a fury every time he casts a spell, increasing his movement speed and damage.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Arcane Bolt
abilities.description: Skywrath Mage launches a slow-moving bolt of arcane magic, dealing damage to an enemy unit based on Skywrath Mage's intelligence.

abilities.name: Concussive Shot
abilities.description: Skywrath Mage sets off a long range shot that hits the closest hero within a long range.  Upon impact, it deals damage and slows in an area of effect.

abilities.name: Ancient Seal
abilities.description: Skywrath Mage seals the targeted unit with an ancient rune, silencing it and causing it to take additional damage from spells.

abilities.name: Mystic Flare
abilities.description:
Skywrath Mage uses his ultimate magical ability to conjure a precise and violent mystical field that lays waste to his adversaries. Deals massive damage distributed evenly among any Heroes in the area over 2.4 seconds.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Mist Coil
abilities.description: Abaddon releases a coil of deathly mist that can damage an enemy unit or heal a friendly unit at the cost of some of Abaddon's health.

abilities.name: Aphotic Shield
abilities.description:
Summons dark energies around an ally unit, creating a shield that absorbs a set amount of damage before expiring. When the shield is destroyed it will burst and deal damage equal to the amount it could absorb to an area around it. Removes certain types of negative buffs and stuns on cast.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel

abilities.name: Curse of Avernus
abilities.description: Abaddon strikes an enemy with chilling curse on each attack, causing all units who attack the slowed enemy to gain increased movement speed, along with faster attack speed, for a limited time.

abilities.name: Borrowed Time
abilities.description:
When activated, all damage dealt to you will heal instead of harm. Most negative buffs will also be removed. If the ability is not on cooldown, it will automatically activate if your health falls below 400.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel

abilities.name: Echo Stomp
abilities.description: Elder Titan and his Astral Spirit both stomp the ground, damaging and knocking nearby enemy units unconscious around their locations.  The Elder Titan stomp deals physical damage, while the Spirit stomp deals magical damage.

abilities.name: Astral Spirit
abilities.description:
Elder Titan sends forth his Astral Spirit, damaging any units it passes through.  When the spirit rejoins the Titan, it grants bonus damage and movement speed for each unit it damaged.

The Astral Spirit possesses the Echo Stomp, Return Spirit, and Natural Order abilities.

abilities.name: Natural Order
abilities.description: Reduces all elements to their basic levels, removing base armor and magic damage resistance from nearby enemy units. The armor reduction is centered around the hero, while the magic armor reduction is centered around Astral Spirit.

abilities.name: Return Astral Spirit
abilities.description: Returns the Astral Spirit to Elder Titan.

abilities.name: Earth Splitter
abilities.description:
Sends forth a jagged crack in front of Elder Titan. After 3 seconds, the crack implodes, slowing movement while dealing damage to each enemy based on their maximum life. Half of the damage dealt is Magical damage, while the other half is Physical damage.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Overwhelming Odds
abilities.description: Turns the enemies' numbers against them, dealing damage and granting you bonus movement speed per unit or per hero.  Deals bonus damage to illusions and summoned units as a percent of their current health.

abilities.name: Press The Attack
abilities.description:
Removes debuffs and disables from the target friendly unit, and grants bonus attack speed and health regen for a short time.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel

abilities.name: Moment of Courage
abilities.description: When attacked, Legion Commander has a chance to immediately counterattack with bonus lifesteal.

abilities.name: Duel
abilities.description:
Legion Commander and the target enemy hero are forced to attack each other for a short duration.  Neither hero can use items or abilities.  If either hero dies during the duration, the hero winning the Duel gains permanent bonus damage.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Firestorm
abilities.description: Calls down waves of fire that damage enemy units in the target area, burning for additional damage over time.

abilities.name: Pit of Malice
abilities.description: A deadly pit is conjured at the target location; any unit that enters will be rooted. Each enemy unit within the pit are affected every 3.6 seconds.

abilities.name: Atrophy Aura
abilities.description:
Nearby enemy units are weakened, losing a portion of their base damage. If a unit dies while under this effect, Underlord gains bonus damage.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Dark Rift
abilities.description: Opens a dark rift at the targeted friendly unit's position.  After a short delay, Underlord and all nearby friendly heroes are teleported to that unit's location.  Dark Rift can be cancelled at anytime during the cast.  If it is cancelled in this way or the target unit dies before the spell becomes active, Dark Rift goes into cooldown.

abilities.name: Cancel Dark Rift
abilities.description: Stop the teleport.

abilities.name: Reflection
abilities.description: Terrorblade brings forth an invulnerable dark reflection of all nearby enemy heroes. Affected enemy heroes are slowed and attacked by their reflection.

abilities.name: Conjure Image
abilities.description: Creates an illusion of Terrorblade that deals damage.

abilities.name: Metamorphosis
abilities.description: Terrorblade transforms into a powerful demon with a ranged attack. Any of Terrorblade's illusions that are within 900 range will also be transformed by Metamorphosis.

abilities.name: Sunder
abilities.description: Severs the life from both Terrorblade and a target hero, exchanging a percentage of both units' current health. Some health points must remain.

abilities.name: Fortune's End
abilities.description:
CHANNELED - Gathers Oracle's power into a bolt of scouring energy that, when released, damages, roots, and purges enemies of buffs in an area around the target. If target is an ally it will only purge. Can be channeled for up to 2.5 seconds. The stop duration is equal to the time spent channeling.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

abilities.name: Fate's Edict
abilities.description: Oracle enraptures a target, disarming them and granting them 100% magic damage resistance. Can be cast on allies and enemies.

abilities.name: Purifying Flames
abilities.description:
Burns away impurities, dealing heavy magic damage to the target before causing them to regenerate health over time. The amount of health regenerated over its duration exceeds the amount of initial damage. Can be cast on enemies and allies.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: False Promise
abilities.description:
Temporarily alters an ally's destiny, delaying any healing or damage taken until False Promise ends. Any healing that is delayed by False Promise is doubled. Removes most negative status effects and disables on initial cast.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel

abilities.name: Arctic Burn
abilities.description:
Winter Wyvern soars upon an arctic wind, granting her unobstructed movement and allowing her to exhale a blistering chill into each attack. While soaring, her attacks travel further and faster, and slow enemies with a magical freeze that strips them of 9% of their current health each second. Her sight is also hardened against night's chill, granting her 400 additional vision range at night while soaring.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Splinter Blast
abilities.description: Launches a ball of brittle ice toward an enemy. The ice shatters on impact, leaving the primary target completely unaffected, while hurling damaging splinters into nearby enemies in a 500 radius. Enemies struck by these splinters are slowed by 25%.

abilities.name: Cold Embrace
abilities.description: Encases an ally in an icy cocoon, freezing them solid while healing a base amount as well as a percentage of their maximum health each second. The cocoon blocks all physical damage.

abilities.name: Winter's Curse
abilities.description: Winter Wyvern freezes an enemy in place while striking those nearby with a maddening curse which causes them to attack their frozen ally with increased attack speed. The frozen ally and those cursed to attack their ally are immune to all damage from their enemies.

abilities.name: Flux
abilities.description: Infuses a lone enemy unit with swirling, volatile energy, slowing its movement speed and dealing damage over time. The effect is muted if another enemy unit is near the target.

abilities.name: Magnetic Field
abilities.description: Generates a circular distortion field of magnetic energy that protects allied heroes and buildings within it by evading attacks coming from outside the field.

abilities.name: Spark Wraith
abilities.description: Summons a Spark Wraith that slowly materializes and patrols a targeted area until an enemy comes within its range. Once a target has been found the wraith fuses with them, dealing magical damage and slowing the unit.

abilities.name: Tempest Double
abilities.description: Briefly refocusing its fractured elements into a single form, the Arc Warden is able to create a perfect electrical duplication of itself. The duplicate can use all of Arc Warden's current items and spells, except consumables and items that drop on death. The duplicate has seperate item and ability cooldowns.
